entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of freezing drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing near noon.
